document.full_text: european planemaker airbus  will find out later on wednesday whether trade judges have upheld a ruling that it benefited from billions of dollars in illegal subsidies that punished its rival boeing .
document.title: wto to rule on airbus subsidy appeal
lines_and_colors: european planemaker airbus  will find out later on wednesday whether trade judges have upheld a ruling that it benefited from billions of dollars in illegal subsidies that punished its rival boeing .
